name: Resident monkey
description: Story mode: Here you can play the game in pairs by pressing the o button Buttons: Player 1: Select your weapon by holding down the Namped 7 button and pressing the Namped 2, 4, 6, 8 buttons Press numpad2 to remove  objects hold numpad9and press Nampad 4 to shoot players By pressing the button down, the player sits down Selects the weapon by holding down the u button and pressing the y, g, h, g buttons He can use the h button to delete objects and the g button to attack the enemy War spirit It is possible to hit the force and jump. The first player is thrown with Namped 8 power and the second power player with y button. I hope you enjoy the game, thank you for your attention.
